name: SLAMMED SHUT
description:
SLAMMED SHUT ENTRY TO JAME GAM #15

Slammed shut is a top down Action game made for the Jame Gam #15 game jam!

Play as door-wielding warrior who's destiny is to take down Douglas fir.

You must collect the very concept of Time in the dungeon before you take down Douglas!

This 'time' will not start to countdown until you've reached Douglas' Chamber.

BUT BE CAREFUL! 

Once You have entered Douglas' Chamber, you will not be able to go back and collect more time. So make sure you have enough before Challenging him.

Or, if you're daring enough, maybe you can try to defeat him in as little time as possible. 

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD: move

LEFT CLICK: Attack

SHIFT: dash

E: interact
